name: Hinn
description: The Hinn is a large elemental creature with the ability to change into a cloud of dust and manipulate the earth around it. It possesses a Gem-Studded Mace and Lob Stones for combat.
memorable: Its unique abilities to burrow through the earth without detection and transform into a cloud make it a versatile and unpredictable opponent.
goals: To control the battlefield and use its elemental powers against its foes.
relations: It may summon earth elementals as allies, showcasing its command over earth-based creatures.
environment: Can be found in varied environments with access to earth and stone.
strengths: Strong defensive capabilities and powerful spellcasting, particularly in controlling the battlefield.
weaknesses: Limited direct ranged attacks and reliance on close to mid-range combat.
attacks: Utilizes Multiattack with a Gem-Studded Mace and Lob Stone to deal significant damage and potentially stun targets.
most_powerful_ability: Earth Glide allows it to move through earth and stone undetected, enabling surprise attacks.
senses: High perception score of 17 grants it the ability to notice hidden creatures or objects effectively.
skills: Possesses good Stealth proficiency, especially in cloud form.
additional_information: Can create an earth elemental as an ally once per day.
Transforms seamlessly between bipedal and cloud forms.
Churned Earth ability causes area disruption and damage.
Stealthy in cloud form, with enhanced abilities.
Can travel between planes of existence.
test_queries: cloud dust creature with powerful melee attacks
elemental that can burrow and transform
stealthy creature that controls the battlefield
